subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Chris Froome maintained his lead on Thursday, but the nearby presence of Armstrong, a disgraced former champion, was called inappropriate by the head of cycling’s governing body.
snippet: Chris Froome maintained his lead on Thursday, but the nearby presence of Armstrong, a disgraced former champion, was called inappropriate by the head of cycling’s governing body.
